data.title: Turan Name Meaning in English & Urdu, Origin, Luck Number
data.meta_description: Turan is a Muslim Arabic baby boy name. Its meaning is "Brave". Turan name origin is Arabic. Write Turan in Urdu, Hindi, Arabic, Bangla : توران, चरण, توران, তুরান., Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Turan Name Meaning in English

What does the name Turan mean? What is the meaning of the name Turan, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Turan Name Meaning. Iranian, Turkish, etc.: ethnic name for someone from Turan, a region of central Asia, said to have been named for Tur, son of Faridun, a legendary king of Persia who ruled around 750 bc.

Turan Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Brave Gender: Boy Origin: Arabic Religion: Muslim Suitable for: Boys / Male / Guys Hardness: Easy to pronounce, Turan is a short name Uniqueness: It is a common name Short & Easy: Yes Syllables: 5 Letters and 1 Words

Turan Name Lucky Number 9

Turan Name Numerology And Personality

Turan has the numerology 9. The meaning of this name is Brave. People with numerology number 9 are the people who are thought to be very selfless and very kind towards the people and everyone around them. These are the people who are always thinking of others over themselves and they take care of everyone around them.

These people believe in creative expression and that is one reason why they are thought to be very humanitarian. The gender of this name Turan is Boy. They always think of what they can do for the humanity.

The religion is Muslim. These are the people who are very obligatory of everything and they also only believe in giving and you will definitely never find these people in takers because they are always the givers. They do not wait for others to do things for them so that they can do it in return rather they are first one to make a move.
